jah du skalka meinamma: tawei þata, jah taujiþ.
MATT 8.10 gahausjands þan Iesus sildaleikida jah qaþ du þaim afarlaistjandam:
ni in Israela swalauda galaubein bigat.
MATT 8.11 aþþan qiþa izwis þatei managai fram urrunsa jah saggqa qimand, jah anakumbjand miþ Abrahama jah Isaka jah Iakoba in þiudangardjai himine:
MATT 8.12 iþ þai sunjus þiudangardjos uswairpanda in riqis þata hindumisto;
jainar wairþiþ grets jah krusts tunþiwe.
MATT 8.13 jah qaþ Iesus þamma hundafada:
gagg, jah swaswe galaubides wairþai þus.
jah gahailnoda sa þiumagus is in jainai ƕeilai.
MATT 8.14 jah qimands Iesus in garda Paitraus, jah gasaƕ swaihron is ligandein in heitom.
MATT 8.15 jah attaitok handau izos jah aflailot ija so heito;

MATT 8.16 at andanahtja þan waurþanamma, atberun du imma daimonarjans managans, jah uswarp þans ahmans waurda jah allans þans ubil habandans gahailida, MATT 8.17 ei usfullnodedi þata gamelido þairh Esaïan praufetu qiþandan:
sa unmahtins unsaros usnam jah sauhtins usbar.
MATT 8.18 gasaiƕands þan Iesus managans hiuhmans bi sik, haihait galeiþan siponjans hindar marein.
MATT 8.19 jah duatgaggands ains bokareis qaþ du imma:
laisari, laistja þuk, þisƕaduh þadei gaggis.
MATT 8.20 jah qaþ du imma Iesus:
fauhons grobos aigun, jah fuglos himinis sitlans, iþ sunus mans ni habaiþ ƕar haubiþ sein anahnaiwjai.
MATT 8.21 anþaruh þan siponje is qaþ du imma:
frauja, uslaubei mis frumist galeiþan jah gafilhan attan meinana.
MATT 8.22 iþ Iesus qaþ du imma:
laistei afar mis jah let þans dauþans gafilhan seinans dauþans.
MATT 8.23 jah innatgaggandin imma in skip, afariddjedun imma siponjos is.
MATT 8.24 jah sai, wegs mikils warþ in marein, swaswe þata skip gahuliþ wairþan fram wegim;
MATT 8.25 jah duatgaggandans siponjos is urraisidedun ina qiþandans:
MATT 8.26 jah qaþ du im Iesus:
þanuh urreisands gasok windam jah marein, jah warþ wis mikil.
MATT 8.27 iþ þai mans sildaleikidedun qiþandans:
ƕileiks ist sa, ei jah windos jah marei ufhausjand imma?
MATT 8.28 jah qimandin imma hindar marein in gauja Gairgaisaine, gamotidedun imma twai daimonarjos us hlaiwasnom rinnandans, sleidjai filu, swaswe ni mahta manna usleiþan þairh þana wig jainana.
ƕa uns jah þus, Iesu, sunau gudis?
qamt her faur mel balwjan unsis?
MATT 8.30 Wasuh þan fairra im hairda sweine managaize haldana.
MATT 8.31 iþ þo skohsla bedun ina qiþandans:
jabai uswairpis uns, uslaubei uns galeiþan in þo hairda sweine.
iþ eis usgaggandans galiþun in hairda sweine;
jah sai, run gawaurhtedun sis alla so hairda and driuson in marein jah gadauþnodedun in watnam.
MATT 8.33 iþ þai haldandans gaþlauhun jah galeiþandans gataihun in baurg all bi þans daimonarjans.
MATT 8.34 jah sai, alla so baurgs usiddja wiþra Iesu, jah gasaiƕandans ina bedun ei usliþi hindar markos ize.
MATT 9.1 Jah atsteigands in skip ufarlaiþ jah qam in seinai baurg.
MATT 9.2 þanuh atberun du imma usliþan ana ligra ligandan.
jah gasaiƕands Iesus galaubein ize qaþ du þamma usliþin:
MATT 9.3 þaruh sumai þize bokarje qeþun in sis silbam:
MATT 9.4 jah witands Iesus þos mitonins ize qaþ:
duƕe jus mitoþ ubila in hairtam izwaraim?
MATT 9.5 ƕaþar ist raihtis azetizo qiþan: afletanda þus frawaurhteis, þau qiþan:
MATT 9.6 Aþþan ei witeiþ þatei waldufni habaiþ sa sunus mans ana airþai afleitan frawaurhtins,
